author: ashbc
title: CubeCommons Community Membership for Polymuse AR
description:
This membership would be shared by CubeCommons users to add AR scans of collections objects to learning materials, audio guides or reading lists. 

Each user would be given 30 days with the login. 
To See Polymuse scans on CubeCommons:
https://www.cubecommons.ca/playlist/54433c15-ef75-431e-ba8a-b912980ac3d5
To check out how polymuse works: 
https://polymuse.tech/
